title: Thunderbird ICS Import Wizard
creator: denyerec
content:
Two questions:

1- Is it possible to assign defaults for ICS import so that you don't have to go through the wizard?

The reason for this wish is question two...

2- Why does the "Next" button in the import wizard appear in a different place in each step? I have a whole bunch of separate ICS files to import due to a workflow issue, and importing them is like playing whack-a-mole. It'd be a huge improvement if the "Next" button could stay in a consistent place so that even if defaults can't be set up, you can just click-click-click in one place without having to dance around with the mouse :)
